text.__SUMMARY__: Madatyphlops domerguei is a species of snake in the family Typhlopidae.
text.Etymology: The specific name, domerguei, is in honor of French herpetologist Charles Domergue.
text.Further reading: Roux-Estève, Rolande (1980). "Une nouvelle espèce de Typhlopidae (Serpentes) du Centre-Est de Madagascar : Typhlops domerguei". Bulletin du Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle de Paris, Series 2, 1: 321-323. (in French).
